headline: ComEd Unveils Long-Range Strategy to Power Illinois’ Clean Energy Future
summary: CHICAGO, November 13, 2025--ComEd today announced the launch of the new Long-Range Strategy (LRS) outlining how the company will prepare the power grid in northern Illinois to meet growing energy demand, maintain affordability, uphold nation-leading reliability, and advance the state’s clean energy and economic goals for decades to come.
